def_en: A memorial is a structure built in order to remind people of a famous person or event.

def_cn: （对逝者）纪念的;悼念的;追思的
def_en: A memorial event, object, or prize is in honour of someone who has died, so that they will be remembered.

def_cn: （追忆逝者的）纪念物,纪念品
def_en: If you say that something will be a memorial to someone who has died, you mean that it will continue to exist and remind people of them.
